pages.text: hananim-eun geugeos-eul chugbogbad-eun bam-e gyesihaessnani geugeos-eulo gyeong-goha goja ham-ila
geunal bam modeun jiheloun ildeul i myeongbaeghayeojini
hananim-ui myeonglyeong-ila sillo geubunkkeseo seonjijadeul-eul bonaessnola
geugeos-eun junim-eulobuteoui jabi la sillo hananim-eun deul-eusigo asi neun bun-isila
neohuiga hwagsilhan mid-eum-eul gajil ttae geubun-eun haneulgwa daeji geuligo geusaie issneun manmul-ui junim-isila
geubun oeeneun sin-i eobs-eumyeo saeng myeong-eul jusigo saengmyeong-eul as-a gasineun bundo geubun-eulo neohuiui junim-iyo ttohan neohui josang-ui junim-isila
haneul-i jit-eun yeongilo gadeug chaneun geunal-eul geudaeneun jikyeobolila
yeongiga salamdeul-eul deop-eo gali uni gotongseuleoun beol-ila
bulsinjadeul-eun juyeo jeohuiege i beol-eul geodueo jusoseo jeohuiga mid gessnaida
geu gyohun-i geudeul-ege yuyongha gessneunyo jinlileul balghyeojuneun seonjijaga geudeul-ege imi imhasyeossdoda
geuleona geudeul-eun geulobuteo deung eul dollimyeo geuga michinjala malhadeo la
hananimkkeseo jamsi eungbeol-eul geo dueo jumyeon neohuineun dasi saagham-eu lo dol-agal geos-ila
gajang gyeoglyeolhan eungbeol-i iss-eul geunal hananim-eun gotongseuleoon beol-eul ga halila
hananim-eun geudeul ijeon-ui pala o baegseong-eul siheomhayeoss-euni hullyunghan seonjijaga geudeul-ege imhayeo
hananim-ui jongdeul-eul naege neomgyeo juo sillo naneun neohuiege on mid-eum ui seonjijala malhadeola
